ERROR.WRONG_DATA: The username or password is incorrect
ERROR.LOGIN: An error occurred while logging in
ERROR.GETTING_IP: An error occurred while retrieving the user's IP address
ERROR.INVALID_FORMAT: The password must contain at least 8 characters: 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number required, and 1 optional special character
ERROR.INVALID_EMAIL: The email must be in the format example@domain.com

ACTIONS.SEND_LINK_CHANGE_PASSWORD: You will soon receive a link in your email to change your password

SUCCESS.PASSWORD_CHANGED: Password has been changed successfully. Please log in with the new password.

WARNING.UPDATING_DATA: Some data needs to be modified first
WARNING.NO_CHECKED_SEARCH_OPTIONS: You must select at least one search option
WARNING.REQUIRED_FIELDS: You must fill in the required fields

ERROR.ACTIVITY_CREATION: An error occurred while creating the activity
ERROR.ACTIVITY_UPDATE: An error occurred while updating the activity
ERROR.NEW_CREATION: An error occurred while creating the news
ERROR.NEW_UPDATE: An error occurred while updating the news
ERROR.COMPLAINT_CREATION: An error occurred while creating the complaint
ERROR.COPMLAINT_UPDATE: An error occurred while updating the complaint

CONFIRM.DISCARD_CHANGES: Are you sure you want to discard the changes?
CONFIRM.DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete the item?
CONFIRM.UPDATE: Are you sure you want to update the changes?
CONFIRM.CREATE_USER: Are you sure you want to create the account?

USER.CREATED_ERROR: An error occurred while creating the user.
USER.ALREADY_EXISTS_EMAIL: The entered email is already registered.

INTRO.PARAGRAPH_1: Welcome to ConectaBarrio! Our platform is designed to promote citizen collaboration and improve life in Barrio del Pilar.
INTRO.PARAGRAPH_2: At ConectaBarrio, we believe in the power of community. Here you can stay informed with the latest news in your area and keep up with everything happening around you.
INTRO.PARAGRAPH_3: Have you found a problem in your neighborhood? Our platform allows you to create public complaints and reports. For example, if you see a pothole in the road, you can inform other users to be careful, as well as notify authorities for prompt repair.
INTRO.PARAGRAPH_4: In addition, at ConectaBarrio, you can create and participate in local events. From sports activities to video game tournaments, there's something for everyone. Join existing events or create your own to connect with people who share similar interests.
INTRO.PARAGRAPH_5: You can also join interest groups like music, reading, and more. These groups allow you to connect with other community members who share your passions, organize meetups, and enjoy your hobbies together.
INTRO.PARAGRAPH_6: Join ConectaBarrio today and be part of the change! Together we can build a more united, informed, and active neighborhood.
